title: On Motorbikes
content:
Earlier to day, I heard a Harley Davidson go past. (I also saw it, but thats not important). I like things that are fast and make lots of noise, but I have never seen the appeal of riding a Harley Davidson.
They are slow and chew through fuel. The only argument I have heard for them that ever vaguely made sense is "you just can't beat that noise." I have to agree. I can't beat it, but I can certainly match it... about half an hour after a helping of bean and potato curry...
